bibl.title: New Performance.
bibl.note: What is new in New Comedy performance? Points to a number of significant shifts. First of all, New Comedy tones down the extrovert, grotesque spectacularity of Old Comedy. However, it creates a spectacle where the visual is densely semiotised, brimful of allusive potential. Menander's Comedy is also inherently intertextual.
bibl.seg: Antonis K. Petrides & Sophia Papaioannou (edd.), New Perspectives on Postclassical Comedy = Pierides Studies in Greek and Latin Literature. 2 (Newcastle, 2010) pp. 79-124.
